scripts.dist: yarn run dist:clean && yarn run dist:createDirectories && yarn run dist:transpile && yarn run dist:copyAssets
scripts.dist:copyAssets: cp -R img dist && cp -R src/dist/* dist/dist/ && cp -R src/css/* dist/css && cp src/*.* dist/ && cp -R locales dist
scripts.dist:createDirectories: mkdir dist && mkdir dist/dist && mkdir dist/css && mkdir dist/img && mkdir dist/locales
scripts.start: yarn run dist && yarn run serve
